name: The HEART - The Story Of The Faceless
name_original: The HEART - The Story Of The Faceless
description:
The 3000s, the earth is infected with a virus that has destroyed most of humanity... And you have to solve the mystery of the spread of infection...

Immerse yourself in the amazing and mysterious world of the HEART - The Story of the Faceless!

An incredible story about an infection that destroyed most of the population and uncover the mystery of the origin of the New World!
